Bupati Serang Ratu Tatu soal Rp 4,5 M dari Wawan: Saya Tidak Menerima
01 Nov 2019, 15:57 by Bahtiar Rifa'i
Serang - Bupati Serang Ratu Tatu Chasanah mengaku tidak tahu menahu soal aliran uang dari adiknya, Tubagus Chaeri Wardana alias Wawan, padanya. Uang itu diduga berasal dari tindak pidana korupsi yang dilakukan Wawan.
"Nggak tahu, nggak tahu. Saya belum dapat panggilan," ujar Ratu Tatu awalnya saat dimintai konfirmasi wartawan, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Seperti diberitakan sebelumnya pada Kamis, 31 Oktober kemarin, terungkap aliran-aliran uang Wawan tersebut dalam pembacaan dakwaan di Pengadilan Tipikor Jakarta. Wawan didakwa melakukan korupsi dalam pengadaan proyek alat kesehatan di Banten serta melakukan pencucian uang.
Pencucian uang yang diduga dilakukan Wawan tersebut termasuk mengalirkan uang ke 2 kakaknya yaitu Ratu Atut Chosiyah dan Ratu Tatu Chasanah serta istrinya, Airin Rachmi Diany. Disebutkan dalam dakwaan itu bila Ratu Atut mendapatkan Rp 3,8 miliar untuk kepentingannya mencalonkan diri sebagai Gubernur Banten, sedangkan Airin disebut mendapatkan Rp 2,9 miliar saat Pilkada Tangerang Selatan.
Sementara itu Ratu Tatu disebut mendapatkan Rp 4,5 miliar. Namun peruntukannya ketika Ratu Tatu menjadi calon Wakil Bupati Serang periode 2010-2015.
Ketika ditanya lagi, Ratu Tatu menepis isi dakwaan tersebut. "Saya tidak menerima. Itu jawaban saya," ucap Ratu Tatu.

Regent of Serang Ratu Tatu about Rp 4.5 billion from Wawan: I did not receive it
01 Nov 2019, 15:57 by Bahtiar Rifa'i
Serang - Regent of Serang Ratu Tatu Chasanah said he did not know anything about the flow of money from his younger brother, Tubagus Chaeri Wardana aka Wawan, to him. The money is thought to have come from corruption committed by Wawan.
"I don't know, I don't know. I haven't gotten a call yet," Ratu Tatu said at first when asked for reporters' confirmation on Friday (1/11/2019).
As reported earlier on Thursday, October 31 yesterday, it was revealed that Wawan's cash flows were read in the indictment at the Jakarta Corruption Court. Wawan was charged with corruption in the procurement of a medical device project in Banten and money laundering.
The money laundering that was allegedly carried out by Wawan included flowing money to his two older siblings, Ratu Atut Chosiyah and Ratu Tatu Chasanah and his wife, Airin Rachmi Diany. It was stated in the indictment that Ratu Atut received Rp3.8 billion for his interests to run for Banten Governor, while Airin was said to have received Rp2.9 billion during the South Tangerang Regional Election.
Meanwhile, Ratu Tatu is said to have received Rp 4.5 billion. But the designation when Ratu Tatu became a candidate for Deputy Regent of Serang for the period 2010-2015.
When asked again, Ratu Tatu dismissed the contents of the indictment. "I do not accept. That's my answer," said Ratu Tatu.
